title: Ricky Martin welcomes fourth child with husband Jwan Yosef as family grows
text:

Ricky Martin has welcomed his forth child with his husband Jwan Yosef.

The couple took to Instagram to reveal the birth of their baby boy.

They also revealed they had named him Renn.

Sharing a beautiful picture of them holding him wrapped in a blanket, singer and actor Ricky said: "Nuestro hijo Renn Martin-Yosef ha nacido", which translates as "Our son Renn Martin-Yosef is born"

Ricky and Jwan are already parents to twins Valentino and Matteo, 11, and daughter Lucia, who was born last year.

Their fans rushed to offer their congratulations on the birth of their new bundle of joy.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

One said: "Blessings and more blessing to the whole fam"

"Handsome widdle man," said another.

It was just one month ago that Ricky announced he was expecting another child.

The Livin' La Vida Loca hitmaker, 47, shared the happy news as he accepted an award during the Human Rights Campaign National Dinner in Washington DC.

He told the crowd: "My family's here... My husband Jwan, I love you."

(Image: ricky_martin/Instagram)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

He continued: "My beautiful twins, Valentino and Matteo, they're also here.

"I love you with all my heart, you're my strength, you inspire me every day, you motivate me to keep doing what I'm doing and you guys are amazing kids. You guys are amazing. I love you."

The She Bangs singer revealed that his little girl was at home with her grandmother before he revealed he and Jwan were growing their brood, as he said: "And by the way, I have to announce that we are pregnant," which resulted in cheers from the audience.

He added: "We are waiting... I love big families."

(Image: Splash News)

On New Year's Eve Ricky surprised fans when he announced the arrival of his daughter baby Lucia Martin-Yosef with a snap on Instagram .

Captioning the pic, the ecstatic couple wrote: “We are beyond happy to announce that we have become parents to a beautiful and healthy baby girl, Lucia Martin-Yosef.

"It has been a special time for us and we cant wait to see where this stellar baby will take us. Both her beautiful brothers and me and Ricky have fallen in love with Lucia.”
description: The singer and actor took to Instagram to announce he's welcomed a beautiful baby boy with his other half
